Class RoomRectangle

java.lang.Object
RoomRectangle
public class RoomRectangle
extends java.lang.Object
Class Rectangle to specify the rectangle to be drawn with a method to draw it

    • RoomRectangle

      public RoomRectangle​(int x, int y, int widthAndHeight, int windowCount, int doorCount, int lightCount, java.lang.String roomName)
      Parameterised constructor.
      Parameters:
      x - int position x
      y - int position y
      widthAndHeight - int width and height values
      windowCount - int nubmer of windows
      doorCount - int nubmer of doors
      lightCount - int
      roomName - String the name of the room that the rectangle represents
